name: TwoTruthsandaLie
0:
”Alexa open two truths”
”Alexa start two truths”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: two truths
des: You are given three statements, one of which is a lie. There are currently two difficulty modes: easy and hard. For each mode, Alexa will tell you three statements: two facts and one lie. Win by correctly telling Alexa which statement is a lie!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
